title: Ezreal icon still not added please help :(
body: Had the skin for 2 years but still haven't seen it added to my account :( everyone in my friends list has had it since a week ago

replies.body: No fear, I took a peek under the hood and it looks like it's there now! :) Go ahead and take a look in your icon collection next time you login!
same here :( still don't get it

Hit you up too, fam! Icon should be there next time you sign in.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
